About.paragraph1: Hello! I'm Flavia, specializing in hair coloring‚Äîespecially blondes, balayage, and ombr√©. Since 2006, I've been deeply involved in the beauty industry, and since 2017, I've been working at iFierce Beauty Lounge.
About.paragraph2: My passion for hair transformation started early when I used to color my mom‚Äôs hair. That led me to invest in courses, training, and hands-on experience at various salons until I finally earned my own chair. Today, I see every client as an opportunity to enhance the confidence they already carry within.
About.paragraph3: My specialty is creating modern and healthy looks while preserving hair integrity. I also love getting to know each client and building long-lasting relationships. For me, hair is not just color‚Äîit‚Äôs expression, connection, and genuine care.
About.paragraph4: Every day, I learn from my team and the unique challenges that come through the salon doors. If you're looking to lighten your hair or completely transform your look, I'm here to help.
About.motto: Motto: ‚ÄúToo much ego will kill your talent.‚Äù
